name: Upside LMS
description: UpsideLMS is a leading provider of learning-technology solutions to businesses worldwide. Established in 2004, it has been consistently building a legacy of innovation and best value for its 1M+ happy users.
features: AI Powered LMS system for organisations
Identifying and bridging the skill gaps of the employees
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Bringing Women Back to Work
ShortDescription: UpsideLMS by Invince is an AI-powered, cloud-based, LMS for employee capability development and training.

Highlights.name: UpsideLMS can Improve New Hire Training
Highlights.description: UpsideLMS helps you seamlessly launch, deliver, and manage your onboarding training right from the start. You create a positive impact on your new hires through personalized training, setting up each employee for success.

Highlights.name: UpsideLMS can Elevate Sales Training
Highlights.description: UpsideLMS helps you effortlessly manage your sales enablement program on different levels, right from recruitment, onboarding, training, providing just-in-time resources to your sales team. Your sales team can now crush the sales target by accessing relevant knowledge, tools, and techniques wherever they are and on whichever device they are using.

Highlights.name: UpsideLMS can Transform Employee Development Training
Highlights.description: UpsideLMS helps you flawlessly develop, deliver, and manage your talent development training programs to enhance the skill-set of your organization and develop skills in-house. Your employees get a chance to develop essential skills, engage with the work thus making your organization a place to thrive in an evolving business environment.

Highlights.name: UpsideLMS can Transform Enterprise Training?
Highlights.description: With UpsideLMS, you can now train and engage your partners and customers more efficiently and boost the success of their learning initiatives and drive brand visibility and user adoption. Not only do you mitigate the risk of your partners underperforming or misinterpreting your brand, you turn them into brand advocates.

Highlights.name: UpsideLMS can Uncomplicate Compliance Training?
Highlights.description: UpsideLMS can seamlessly deliver your compliance training program and help you regularly evaluate and update compliance learning content. This way, your team is abreast with the latest regulatory changes thus helping your business avoid penalties and promote a positive brand recognition.

enhanced_description: UpsideLMS is an AI-powered, cloud-based Learning Management System (LMS) established in 2004, serving businesses worldwide. It focuses on employee capability development and training, consistently delivering innovation and value to over 1 million users by identifying and bridging skill gaps and accelerating learning efficiency.
key_use_cases: Enterprise training for partners and customers
Identifying and bridging employee skill gaps
competitive_advantages: Cloud-based deployment for accessibility and flexibility
Specialization in identifying and bridging skill gaps
roi_benefits: Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
Improved new hire success and positive onboarding experience
Elevated sales performance and achievement of sales targets
Enhanced organizational skill-sets and in-house talent development
More efficient partner and customer training
Boosted brand visibility and user adoption (for partners/customers)
Mitigation of risks related to partner underperformance or brand misinterpretation
Avoidance of penalties through up-to-date compliance training
compliance_features: Delivery and management of compliance training programs
Support for regular evaluation and updating of compliance learning content
Assistance in adhering to regulatory changes and avoiding penalties
scalability_features: Supports small, large, and global enterprises
Designed to accommodate over 1 million users
